\subsection*{My Experience}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{oxy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 15 mg & oral & Pharms - Oxycodone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 130.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Ok so I took 1 and a half 10/325 Oxys equals to 15 Mg and I was sitting in a circle with 3 other people burning some bud when it started to hit me and I first felt my nose getting itchy so I knew it was all about to hit me hen all of the sudden I noticed I was getting Kinda spacey. 



Like having to ask someone to repeat what they said. My legs were starting to feel like they were Cumming(basically by that I mean tingly and Kinda weak) and then my favorite part that warm itchy Kinda feeling in my face. 



But I find when I do these kind of substances like I cud write a really good rap or draw something for me it like sparks creativivty. Its probably one of the best types of buzz someone can have but can also be one of the most dangerous but for an occational treat it fucking rocks the cock.
